content: creepers all around by tracey mcdowell 2013 gauge 5 stitches per inch needles 6 4 0 circular needles 6 4 0 dpns sizes 80 for kids size hat 90 for average size adult hat 100 for large adult hat hat edging co 80 90 100 place a stitch marker to mark the beginning of your round work 1x1 ribbing k1p1 for 5 row hat body round 1 knit evenly around 80 90 100 stitches being careful to not twist your stitches you start with 80/90/100 but later you will add a few stitches in so the total will be 80/92/104 round 2 work with creepers all around graph for 9 row using intarsia method or if you are feeling more in a slime mood use this graph or this one **you will have 8 creepers or slimes on small size 9 creepers on average size hat and 10 creepers on large size around** you can modify this depending on how high up the hat you want your creeper graphic to be i chose to do it right over the ribbing but in the middle or the top of the hat is fine too round 10 once your graphic is done continue in plain stockinette stitch until your hat measures 5 5 6 5 7 inches from cast on edge crown shaping kids hat only decrease every other row at this point you still have 80 stitches make sure the 3 markers you add in are not the same color as your first marker so you don t get confused place markers knit 20 place marker around repeat till end 4 markers total 80 stitches round 1 k2tog k16 ssk in each of your four sections around 72 stitches round 2 knit even around 72 stitches round 3 k2tog k14 ssk in each section around 64 stitches round 4 knit even around 64 stitches round 5 k2tog be happening every round** round 9 k2tog k8 ssk in each section around 40 stitches round 10 k2tog k6 ssk in each section around 32 stitches round 11 k2tog k4 ssk in each section around 24 stitches round 12 k2tog k2 ssk in each section around 16 stitches round 13 k2tog ssk in each section 8 stitches run yarn through last 8 stitches pull together slightly secure and run in tail
